name: Plasma Blast

fail.title: Failure! Target is Pushed 5ft away and knocked Prone.

fail.name: Prone
fail.desc:
A prone creature's only movement option is to crawl, unless it stands up and thereby ends the condition.
 - The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
 - An attack roll against the creature has advantage if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature. Otherwise, the attack roll has disadvantage.

effects.text:
You hurl a ball of crackling storm energy at a target. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 lightning damage and 1d6 thunder damage, and if the target is Large or smaller it must make a strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be pushed 5 feet away from you and knocked prone. 

**At Higher Levels.** When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the thunder damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
